content: this favourite hair scrunchy crochet pattern is so easy at only two rounds it is fun to make and a quick gift for family and friends in creating the pattern i tried a couple of different methods of making the scrunchy but in the end decided that simple is best it meant that i could make several scrunchies in different colours in a relatively short amount of time a free written copy of this crochet pattern can be found on my ad supported website https //richtexturescrochet com/favourite-hair-scrunchy-crochet-pattern/ a free video tutorial for this pattern can be found on my youtube channel https //www youtube com/c/richtexturescrochet/ skill level beginner gauge n/a finished size approximately 3 5 inches in diameter yarn truboo by lion brand® 241 yds/220 m 100g/3 5 oz 100% rayon from bamboo 3 light weight you will only need about 20 yards hook size g/6 4 mm hook notions yarn needle hair elastic
